General.Name: Quizam Media Corporation
General.Description: Quizam Media Corporation provides computer training and consulting services in Canada, Europe, and the United States. It provides computer based educational programs, as well as engages in film production and cannabis retail sales businesses. The company also operates retail cannabis dispensaries. Quizam Media Corporation was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 609 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1G6

3.Name: Mr. Dave  Babych
